meanings.definition: A substance or product used to remove dead skin cells from the surface of the skin.
meanings.sent1: I bought a gentle exfoliant to help my skin feel smoother.
meanings.sent2: She applied the exfoliant to her face before washing it off.
meanings.sent3: The exfoliant worked like a little scrubber, cleaning away the old skin.
meanings.sent4: Using the exfoliant was like peeling away layers to reveal fresh skin underneath.
meanings.sent5: The exfoliant was like a magic eraser, making my skin look brand new.

meanings.definition: The process of shedding dead skin cells.
meanings.sent1: Regular exfoliation helps with the natural exfoliant of the skin.
meanings.sent2: After a few days, the exfoliant of my skin made it look brighter.
meanings.sent3: The exfoliant of shedding skin felt like a tiny snowfall on my body.
meanings.sent4: The exfoliant of skin shedding was a gentle reminder of renewal.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the exfoliant of dead skin cells happening after using the scrub.
